column1: Fried Rice with Tomatoes and Potatoes
column3:
-3 cups cooked white rice
-1 small potato, cubed
-1/2 cup diced tomatoes
-1 tablespoon olive oil
-Salt and pepper, to taste
column4:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the potatoes to the skillet then cook until they are golden brown and fork-tender, about 10 minutes.
3. Add the diced tomatoes and cooked white rice to the skillet and season with salt and pepper.
4. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring the ingredients together to ensure even cooking.
5. Serve the fried rice and enjoy!
